result.title: What is wrong with this go????
result.content:
verified here https://www.jdoodle.com/execute-go-online

and with 1.6 and 1.7 I have 0 issues with this code but as soon as i hit test 7 in http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/448/D it breaks despite it working on every other site I try. any idea what the issue is?

package main

import "fmt"
import "math"

func calc(n int, m int, num int) int {
	maxi := int(math.Sqrt(float64(num)))
	re := 0
	for i := 1; i <= maxi; i++ {
		if num%i == 0 {
			se := num / i
			if (i <= n) && (se <= m) {
				re++
			}
			if (i <= m) && (se <= n) {
				re++
			}
			if (se == i) && (se <= n) && (se <= m) {
				re--
			}
		}
	}
	return re

}

func main() {
	var n, m, k int
	fmt.Scanf("%d %d %d\n", &n, &m, &k)
	var ans int64 = 9223372036854775807

	mini := 0
	maxi := n*m + 2
	for mini < maxi {
		var temp int = 0
		var mid int = int(mini+maxi) / 2
		var re int = calc(n, m, mid)
		for i := 1; i <= n; i++ {
			temp += int(math.Min(float64(mid/i), float64(m)))
		}
		var r1 int = temp - re + 1
		var r2 int = temp
		if (k <= r2) && (k >= r1) {
			mini++
			ans = int64(math.Min(float64(ans), float64(mid)))

		}
		if temp >= k {
			maxi = mid
		} else {
			mini = mid + 1
		}
	}
	fmt.Println(ans)
}
